    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, int initStamina, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.MoveActorAction action, MapReset mapReset)
      Constructor for the Player class.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to call the player in the UI.
      displayChar - The character to represent the player in the UI.
      hitPoints - The player's starting number of hit points.
      initStamina - The player's initial stamina attribute.
      action - The MoveActorAction for the player.
      mapReset - The MapReset instance for resetting maps.
